text: Carl Daniel Erskine (December 13, 1926 - April 16, 2024) was an American right-handed starting pitcher in Major League Baseball. He played his entire career for the Brooklyn and Los Angeles Dodgers from 1948 through 1959. Erskine died on April 16, 2024 from pneumonia in Anderson, Indiana at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * * BaseballLibrary â€“ profile and career highlights * Society for American Baseball Research.
